string.text: Map not available for this area
New concept artwork available in the review library.
New comic edition available in the review library.
There are currently not enough active heroes for all players. Some players will be in standby until more heroes are added at a S.H.I.E.L.D. Access Point.
Great job! Mission accomplished! But your work isn't done yet.
You have just leveled up!\nSkill improvements can be automatically spent from now on, or you may continue to do this yourself
Outfit each character with beneficial equipment that will help enhance their abilities. Would you like equipment to be distributed automatically?
Press SELECT button to Level Up
You found a data disc!\n%d of %d data discs found.
Automatically spend skill points after a short time
Leave all current hero spend settings alone
Leave all current hero settings alone
You found a Daredevil action figure!\n%d of %d Daredevil action figures found.
\n\nYou have now unlocked Daredevil as a playable character!
You found a Black Panther action figure!\n%d of %d Black Panther action figures found.
\n\nYou have now unlocked Black Panther as a playable character!
When one player gets separated from the others, use $SOLO to regroup.
When one player gets separated from the others, pull $SOLO to regroup.
Hard difficulty is now available for play.
Nick Fury is now available for play.
All hero outfits are now available for use.
%s Must Not Be Defeated More Than %d Times
Challengers must defeate five champions in sixty seconds!
You Have Achieved The Highest Score!
The S.H.I.E.L.D. Simulator will be unlocked once you have reached level 6 in story mode.\n\nSkirmish modes will begin unlocking at level 16.
Your current S.H.I.E.L.D. Simulator session will end and its progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to exit the S.H.I.E.L.D. Simulator comic mission?
Your session has ended and you will no longer be connected to the other players.
You have acquired a S.H.I.E.L.D. Simulator disc that contains the comic mission:\n\n~02%s~~
Do not allow %d %ss to be defeated.
Call for help from allies %d times.
You failed to defend the civilians.
The danger level got too high.
You failed to protect the targets.
There are not enough targets remaining to execute the move.
The disc which contains this comic mission has not yet been found. Once you find the disc, the computer will have it on file.
You are not high enough level to play this game type.
There are no unlocked characters for sparring.
There are no high scores recorded.
Single player Training courses are unavailable for Online play.
No awards can be received when players play as enemies
You are not high enough level for any Skirmish modes.
Do you wish to save your high scores? These are saved with your game options.
Your progress in this comic mission will be lost. Do you wish to continue?
You must complete these objectives to pass this course.
Vuln. to Knockback ( Charge $SMASH and Release )
Uses this power when controlled by AI and the ally button is pressed.
Your current game will end without saving. All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to exit to the main menu?
Reach into the grab bag and take your chances with what you will get.
New comics added to your collection have given the following permanent bonuses
Congratulations! \nYou have found all concept artwork. \nBonus Marvel artwork unlocked.
Purchase these discs to load S.H.I.E.L.D. simulator courses into the computer.
You cannot drop any more equipment here. Please move to a less crowded area.

Increases the damage you do with melee attacks.

~02Damage Bonus~~
+10% per level
+20% per Strike

~02Attack Scope~~
Regular Attack, Heavy Attack

Increases your health points ($HP).

~02Health~~
25
+5 per level
+3 per Body

Increases your energy points ($EP), energy regeneration, and melee $DMG_MENTAL.

~02Energy~~
30
+4 per level
+3 per Focus

~02Energy Regeneration :~~ +^%d%%
~02Damage Bonus :~~ +^%d%%
Complete these objectives for additional experience and potential reward.
You have no objectives to accomplish yet.
Stays away from enemies attacking only when attacked

When an AI teammate's health drops below this level, AI will automatically use health packs as long as there are more than 2 remaining.\n\nNOTE: This setting is synchronized for all story mode heroes.
Automatically spends stat points when a level is gained.
Automatically spends skill points when a level is gained.
Automatically distributes equipment between all active characters with this enabled when new equipment is obtained.

Indicates if potions will be used when you try to pickup another but cannot carry any more and still have some health to be gained. This helps to keep you from leaving health behind.\n\nNOTE: This setting is synchronized for all story mode heroes.

~02AI Skill~~\nThe skill slot that this hero will attempt to execute when you $PRESS $SOLO to call for help.\nIf there is a more appropriate skill for the range they are from the target, they may elect to use that instead.
You cannot drop equipment while unconscious.

%s has just learned a third attack power.\n\nWhile pulling and holding $POWER when playing, you can press $DPAD_UP to cycle what powers are assigned to any hero by pressing in the direction of the button you want to change.

%s has just learned a third attack power.\n\nWhile holding $POWER when playing, you can use $DPAD_UP to cycle what powers are assigned to any hero by pressing in the direction of the button you want to change.

%s has just learned a third attack power.\n\nWhile holding $POWER when playing, you can use $DPAD_UP to cycle what powers are assigned to any hero by pressing in the direction of the button you want to change.
Recovers 33% of maximum $EP with a chance for 66% based on Focus
Recovers 33% of maximum $HP with a chance for 66% based on Body
Advances character one level in experience
Gives character one extra skill point to distribute
Character skill points can be redistributed as desired
Lockjaw must rest before creating another targeted portal. Please wait until the Portal timer expires.
Lockjaw cannot create a targeted portal in this area.
You must distribute all skill points before you train to the next level.
Reduces 1 damage for each point of Defense.
Would you like to play in arcade mode or cooperative mode?\n(Arcade mode will remove uncontrolled heroes from the team)
Choose the hero you would like to start playing as:
An innocent bystander has been killed.
The Shi'ar ship has self destructed.
The nuclear missile hit its target and killed millions of innocent civilians.
Are you sure you want to delete this game?
Insufficient space to create a new save. Select a save file to overwrite.
Are you sure you wish to delete this save file?
Please reconnect the controller and press $MENU_OK to continue.
No Nintendo GameCube Controller is detected. Please insert a Nintendo GameCube Controller into a Controller Socket.
The DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller is not detected. Please insert a DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller to controller port 1, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
Please reconnect the controller to controller port %s and press $MENU_OK to continue.
The Nintendo GameCube Controller in Controller Socket %s can not be detected. Please reinsert the Nintendo GameCube Controller into the Controller Socket.
The DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller is not detected. Please insert a DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller to controller port %s, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
The Analog Controller (DUALSHOCK${R}2) is not detected. Please insert an Analog Controller (DUALSHOCK${R}2) to controller port %s, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
The Analog Controller (DUALSHOCK${R}2) is not detected. Please insert an Analog Controller (DUALSHOCK${R}2) to controller port 1, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
The Playstation 3 analog controller is not detected. Please insert a PlayStation 3 analog controller to controller port %s, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
The PlayStation 3 analog controller is not detected. Please insert a PlayStation 3 analog controller to controller port 1, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
Please reconnect controller %s and press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
The multitap (for PlayStation${R}2) is not detected. Please insert the multitap (for PlayStation${R}2) to controller port 1, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
Choose a saved game to load character statistics from, or use the default character statistics.
Choose a saved game to load character statistics from.
There are no Marvel: Ultimate Alliance saved games.
There's a problem with the disc you're using. It may be dirty or damaged.

Insufficient free space on memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Insert a memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) with at least %d KB of free space, or create some space using the console's internal browser. Do you want to continue without saving?

No memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) inserted. If you wish to save your game data, insert a memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) with at least %d KB of free space. Do you want to continue without saving?
Memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s is unformatted. Format memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2)?
Insufficient free space on memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Marvel: Ultimate Alliance requires %d KB of free space to save data.
No memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s.
Saving data. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s, controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Save failed! Check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s and please try again.
No Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save data present on memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s.
Memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s is unformatted.
Load failed! Check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s and please try again.
Loading data. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s, controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Checking memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2), controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) error! Please check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Do you want to retry?
Are you sure you wish to format memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s?
Formatting memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2), controller, or reset/switch off console.
Format failed! Please check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s and try again.
Deleting data. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s, controller, or reset/switch off console.
Delete failed! Please check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s and try again.
Overwriting data. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s, controller, or reset/switch off console.
Overwrite failed! Please check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s and try again.
Marvel: Ultimate Alliance game data is not present on memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. This game requires %d KB of free space. Initialize now?
Saving data. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s, controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Save failed! Please check memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s and try again.
Are you sure you wish to delete this save file?
Checking memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) status. Do not remove memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2), controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Are you sure you wish to overwrite this save file?
No memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 or MEMORY CARD slot 2.
The contents of MEMORY CARD slot %s have changed. Please check the Memory Card and try again.
The Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save on memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s is corrupted.
Damaged save files have been found on the memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Delete damaged save files?

Insufficient free space on memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s. Marvel: Ultimate Alliance requires %d KB of free space to save data. Would you like to overwrite previous Marvel: Ultimate Alliance data?

Your Xbox doesn't have enough free blocks to save games. You need to free %d more blocks.
Saving game. Please don't turn off your Xbox console.
Loading game. Please don't turn off your Xbox console.
Deleting data. Please don't turn off your Xbox console.
Overwriting game. Please don't turn off your Xbox console.
Are you sure you wish to delete this save game?
Are you sure you wish to overwrite this save game?
Your Xbox doesn't have enough free blocks to save games. You need to free %d more blocks. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue without saving or $MENU_BACK to free more blocks.
The saved game appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
The saved options appear to be damaged and cannot be used. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
Your current game will end without saving. All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to load saved game?
You have reached the maximum saved games for Marvel: Ultimate Alliance. You must delete some saved games before you can save more games.
Unable to save options to disk. When you turn off the console the option changes will not be saved.
Saving options. Please don't turn off your Xbox console.
The Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save is damaged. This save needs to be deleted.
Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save data appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
Do you want to save options to hard disk?
Do you want to save unlocked features to hard disk?
Do you want to load saved Options from hard disk?
Your Xbox doesn't have enough free blocks to save options. You need to free %d more blocks.
Your Xbox doesn't have enough free blocks to save options. You need to free %d more blocks. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue without saving or $MENU_BACK to free more blocks.
You do not have enough free blocks to create a new save game. Select save game to overwrite.
Do you want to save options to your gamer profile?
Checking for Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save content.
Are you sure you wish to overwrite this save game?
Loading content. Please don't turn off your console.
Saving content. Please don't turn off your console.
You do not have an active gamer profile. You need to sign in with a gamer profile to save and load game files.
No storage device selected. You need to select a storage device to save and load game files.
Do you want to save unlocked features to your gamer profile?
Selected device does not have sufficient space to save game.
Load failed. This save is damaged and cannot be used.

The Memory Card in Slot %s does not have sufficient space to save all types of Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save files. Options requires 1 file and 1 block. Story mode requires 1 file and %d blocks. Existing files may be loaded and overwritten.
No Memory Card found in Slot A or Slot B.
The Memory Card in Slot %s is corrupted and needs to be formatted. Do you want to format?

The Memory Card in Slot %s does not have sufficient space to save all types of Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save files. Options requires 1 file and 1 block. Story mode requires 1 file and %d blocks. To manage the contents of your Memory Card, use the Memory Card Screen.
Saving to the Memory Card in Slot %s. Do not touch the Memory Card or the POWER Button.

Formatting the Memory Card in Slot %s. Do not touch the Memory Card or the POWER Button.
Format failed! Please check Memory Card in Slot %s and try again.

Saving to the Memory Card in Slot %s. Do not touch the Memory Card or the POWER Button.
Save failed! Please check Memory Card in Slot %s and try again.

No Memory Card found in Slot A or Slot B.

The Memory Card in Slot %s is corrupted and needs to be formatted. Do you want to format?

The Memory Card in Slot %s is damaged and cannot be used.
Wrong device in Slot %s. Please insert a Memory Card.
The Marvel: Ultimate Alliance file on the Memory Card in Slot %s is corrupted. This file needs to be deleted.
Ready to save. Do not touch the Memory Card in Slot %s or the POWER Button.
Do you want to save options to a Memory Card?
Do you want to save unlocked features to a Memory Card?
The Memory Card in Slot %s has reached the maximum number of Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save files. In order to save, an existing file must be overwritten.

The Memory Card in Slot %s does not have sufficient space to save all types of Marvel: Ultimate Alliance save files. Options requires 1 file and 1 block. Story mode requires 1 file and %d blocks. To manage the contents of your Memory Card, use the Memory Card Screen. Chose a game to overwrite.
The saved options appear to be corrupt and cannot be used.

Enter the name of your team
Since you have not yet customized a team, please choose from one of the pre-made teams below
The amount of hit points for this hero.
The amount of energy points for this hero.
You do not have any critical quests at this time
The amount of experience required to next level.
Outfits can only be changed from a S.H.I.E.L.D. Access Point.
%s has been unlocked!\n\nYou may swap this hero in for play at the next S.H.I.E.L.D. Access Point

Your heroes can benefit from each other when working together in groups of 3 or more. Customize your team and fine tune their joined abilities to give you an extra edge in battle. You may select which heroes are part of the team, but it will cost you reputation if you change your mind.
Accept the current settings? You will not be able to change them later.
The host has not yet customized a MyTeam.
You have unlocked the ability to create your own Marvel Team.\n\nYou can create your team now, or later on at any S.H.I.E.L.D. Access point.
